text: {{Infobox writer | name = Kirsi Kunnas | image= Kirsi Kunnas 2.jpg | caption = Kunnas in 2012 | birth_name = Kirsi Marjatta Kunnas | birth_date = | birth_place = Helsinki, Finland | death_date = | death_place = Ylöjärvi, Finland | nationality = Finnish | occupation = Poet, translator | noorks = | influences = | website = | religion = }} Kirsi Marjatta Kunnas (14 December 1924 – 8 November 2021) was a Finnish poet, children's literature author and translator. Her works included poems, fairy tale books, drama, translations and non-fiction. Her books have been translated into Swedish, English, German, French, Hungarian, Estonian and Polish. Kunnas died in her sleep at her home in Ylöjärvi on 8 November 2021, aged 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Finnish poets Category:Children's writers Category:Translators Category:Writers from Helsinki
title: Kirsi Kunnas
